name: godbot
description: The 'GodBot' bot code, created for the unofficial Discord server of web and mobile game Godville.
updateMsg1: 6.2.0 Godville's blog posts are now automatically published to #godville-blogs.
updateMsg2: 6.0.0 GodBot's code is now public at https://github.com/Hedge4/godvillebot, feel free to contribute!
updateMsg3: 5.29.2 GodBot can now solve locations from the crossword as well!
author: Hedde van Heerde <heddevanheerde4@gmail.com>
